chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has a problem: neither the CIF of ATI nor the seller's company appear. Thank you.

Dear ecomobile 

We kindly request the invoice for the order to be sent to us. Your prompt assistance is greatly appreciated.

Thank you.

Regards,
Sarah from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
